AI Description: score-P is a performance measurement system targeted at HPC applications. It provides a comprehensive suite for event trace analysis, profile evaluation, and performance report generation. The tool assists in gaining insights into application execution and identifying potential optimizations.
Core Features: Event Trace Analysis, Profile Evaluation, Performance Report Generation, Hpc Application Performance Measurement
General Tags: Hpc Tools, Performance Measurement, Event Trace Analysis, Profile Evaluation, Optimization, Hpc Applications
